format: A data frame with 12 observations on the following 5 variables.

parameters.cases: number of passengers with same pattern of covariates
parameters.class: ticket class 1= 1st class; 2= second class; 3= third class

title: titanicgrp
description:
Description
The data is an grouped version of the 1912 Titanic passenger survival 
log,
reference:
titanicgrp is saved as a data frame.
Used to assess risk ratios
